metadata.title: CVE-2021-47367 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:virtio-net: fix pages leaking when building skb in big modeWe try to use build_skb() if we had sufficient tailroom. But we forgetto release the unused pages chained via private in big mode which willleak pages. Fixing this by release the pages after building the skb inbig mode.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
